original_title: 犯されたふたりに未来はあるのか!?
overview: "Speaking of which, it's the first time I've talked to you." Although they often see each other in the office, they have no chance to talk to each other and are just acquaintances. Aoi, who is troubled by an affair with her boss, and Yuria, who is troubled by her husband's affair. … Such a daily life of two people turned into a quagmire one day.
title: Is There A Future For The Two Who Got Raped!? ?
